content.name: Night of the Zealot
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Friday, September 18, 1925. Arkham, Massachusetts. There is something wrong with this town, and not a whole lot this old soothsayer can do to stop the slide...

content.name: The Dunwich Legacy
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: A monstrous presence once terrorized the secluded village of Dunwich, until professors from Miskatonic University, armed with secret knowledge, allegedly defeated the creature...

content.name: The Path to Carcosa
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: For weeks, the upcoming performance of the King in Yellow has been the talk of the town, but after researching the play's dark history, you are convinced something foul is at work...

content.name: The Forgotten Age
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: When renowned archaeologist Alejandro Vela discovered the ruins of an ancient Aztec city, it set into motion a plot that could unravel the very fabric of time itself...

content.name: The Circle Undone
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: While investigating the disappearances of four people from an estate in French Hill, you uncover a grim fate that is meant for the entirety of Arkham...

content.name: The Dream-Eaters
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: After hearing occult author Virgil Gray's account of his experiences in the 'Dreamlands', you too find yourself lost in a hidden realm full of imagination and nightmare...

content.name: The Innsmouth Conspiracy
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: In the shadowy seaport of Innsmouth, strange creatures have been sighted by the reef, and a tangled scheme involving a missing government agent has begun to unravel...

content.name: Edge of the Earth
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Deep within the icy continent of Antarctica lies a secret; one so ancient and profound, it threatens to tear apart our very understanding of the planet we call home...

content.name: The Scarlet Keys
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Strange disappearances haunt the city of Arkham, with items and people vanishing not just from existence, but from memory and history as well. Only you remember...

content.name: The Feast of Hemlock Vale
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: When renowned botanist Dr. Rosa Marquez receives a strange sample from the secluded and mysterious Hemlock Isle, her instincts tell her that something is amiss. The investigators only have three days to find out what lurks beneath Hemlock Vale before its people meet a terrible fate.

content.name: The Drowned City
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: It was supposed to be one last job. At the behest of shadowy antiquarian Randall Tillinghast — who presents them with an offer they can’t refuse — our investigators travel to the South Pacific and the vast, alien city of R’lyeh. However, the more they explore, the more terrors they discover ...

content.name: Return to Night of the Zealot
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Friday, September 18, 1925. Arkham, Massachusetts. There is something wrong with this town, and not a whole lot this old soothsayer can do to stop the slide...

content.name: Return to The Dunwich Legacy
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: A monstrous presence once terrorized the secluded village of Dunwich, until professors from Miskatonic University, armed with secret knowledge, allegedly defeated the creature...

content.name: Return to The Path to Carcosa
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: For weeks, the upcoming performance of the King in Yellow has been the talk of the town, but after researching the play's dark history, you are convinced something foul is at work...

content.name: Return to The Forgotten Age
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: When renowned archaeologist Alejandro Vela discovered the ruins of an ancient Aztec city, it set into motion a plot that could unravel the very fabric of time itself...

content.name: Return to The Circle Undone
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: While investigating the disappearances of four people from an estate in French Hill, you uncover a grim fate that is meant for the entirety of Arkham...

content.name: The Blob that Ate Everything
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: An extraterrestrial foe with the ability to devour everything in its path has come to Arkham; it must be contained and destroyed before it is too late...

content.name: Carnevale of Horrors
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: A foul conspiracy is afoot in the Venice, and something rising from the lagoon threatens to turn the mood of the city's Carnevale from celebration to terror...

content.name: Curse of the Rougarou
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: While investigating a series of recent killings in New Orleans, the curse affecting the bayou threatens to consume you as well...

content.name: Guardians of the Abyss
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: While traveling to Cairo to unravel the secrets of a medical mystery, you find yourself caught in the web of a deadly plot. A day of reckoning is coming...

content.name: The Labyrinths of Lunacy
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: After being kidnapped by a mysterious mastermind, you are forced to take part in his cruel experiments in order to escape...

content.name: Machinations Through Time
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Nobel Award-winning scientists and their revolutionary discoveries have vanished and you must travel through the past, present, and future to repair the broken timeline...

content.name: Murder at the Excelsior Hotel
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: The note you received read: 'Room 225. Tonight. Come Alone'. Can you figure out the truth behind the grisly murder at the Excelsior Hotel in time to clear your name?

content.name: War of the Outer Gods
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Three fantatical cults are vying to be the first to summon their patron Outer God; its up to you to thwart their devious machinations before Earth is in engulfed in all-out war...

content.name: Fortune and Folly
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: A casino in Monte Carlo is twisting luck in its favor, gaining massive wealth while endangering its patrons in the process... Care to try your luck?

content.name: The Midwinter Gala
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: It’s the dead of winter, and Arkham’s social elite have arrived in mist-shrouded Kingsport for an exquisite gala hosted by the enigmatic Lantern Club. Unfortunately, it doesn’t take long before nightmarish creatures crash the festivities, and it falls to you to uncover the Club’s dark schemes!

content.name: Challenge Scenario - All or Nothing
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: When “Skids” O’Toole walks through the door, it’s up to you and Lady Luck to take the Clover Club for as much as you can — all before slipping out the door with your kneecaps intact...

content.name: Challenge Scenario - Bad Blood
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Agnes Baker may have assumed that she was alone in her modern reincarnation from a past life as a sorceress of Hyperborea, but a newcomer has come to Arkham — Elspeth Baudin...

content.name: Challenge Scenario - By the Book
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Roland is quickly becoming a thorn in Mr. Grey’s side and, if the politician’s underlings don’t deal with him, Mr. Grey will confront Roland himself.

content.name: Challenge Scenario - Laid to Rest
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: It was the dead who led you to Arkham. You eke out a living playing your father’s trumpet. The dead get louder when you play. Sometimes they even compliment your music...

content.name: Challenge Scenario - Read or Die
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: A specter from Daisy’s past rises once more as Dr. Armitage summons you to the Orne Library. Something has been unleashed on Miskatonic University, and it’s up to you to stop it...

content.name: Challenge Scenario - Red Tide Rising
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Wendy is dead-set on finding her father. With a Mysterious Photo as your primary tool, Wendy must find her way through the treacherous town of Innsmouth and try to gather information...

content.name: Challenge Scenario - Relics of the Past
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: To better understand our future, we must first understand our past. Monterey Jack heard of the Miskatonic University's failed expedition to the jungles of Mexico. He packs his bags and makes plans for his own expedition.

content.name: Barkham Horror - The Meddling of Meowlathotep
content.author: Fantasy Flight Games
content.description: Barkham Horror is an alternate universe in which the conflict between humanity and the eldritch forces of the Mythos takes a back seat, and the conflict between dogs and cats takes center stage.

content.name: Across the Obelisk
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: 21 investigators: 4 for each class and 1 neutral investigator from the co-op roguelite deckbuilder

content.name: Aespa Investigators
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: Investigators inspired by the K-Pop girl group Aespa.

content.name: Arkham Irregulars
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Arkham Irregulars is a set of ten custom investigators. Many are designed around aspects of cards or classes that have not been explored significantly as of this moment.

content.name: Arkham's Finest
content.author: DerBK
content.description: A set of five investigators with simple 5/2 mainclass/subclass deckbuilding that are meant to cover for the situations where the official investigators in that class combination can not use their card pool as much as we'd want.

content.name: Baldur's Gate III
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: 331 Player Cards with 12 New Investigators from Baldur's Gate III by Larian Studios based off the Dungeons and Dragons 5e system. Alpha testing, with large changes to be expected.

content.name: Battle Goes On
content.author: The Popest
content.description: Expansion that is based on a game mode that's recently added to Sanguosha - includes animated cards!

content.name: Blood of Drakul
content.author: Myriad
content.description: This is a little more 'fantastical' than vanilla Arkham typically gets, but obviously there are a lot of good horror tropes to mine from the castlevania/bloodborne milleu and this tries to integrate some of those ideas in an original way.

content.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer - Investigators
content.author: AtomicZ
content.description: Bring Buffy Summers and her allies into a different world of Eldritch Horror with this full investigator expansion.

content.name: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
content.author: Adran06
content.description: The planeteers have come to Arkham to help! Included in this set are the 5 planeteers, plus ally versions of each, along with a special card that lets you play Captain Planet! The investigators are all fairly supportive, emphasising teamwork more than normal.

content.name: Cartoon Funtime Investigators
content.author: TheBudiez
content.description: A collection of custom cartoon investigators made to be used for fun.

content.name: Circus Ex Mortis
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Welcome to the greatest show of your life! The New Moon Circus visits Arkham with a cruel and insidious plot, concerning ancient prophecy and the coming eclipse!

content.name: City of Secrets
content.author: aughhhh
content.description: This contains ten lore-friendly investigators loosely inspired by the gameplay defining mechanics introduced in the Ravnica: City of Guilds expansion for Magic the Gathering.

content.name: City of Secrets II
content.author: aughhhh
content.description: This contains ten more lore-friendly investigators loosely inspired by the gameplay defining mechanics introduced in the Ravnica: City of Guilds expansion for Magic the Gathering.

content.name: Elspeth Baudin (As Seen in Bad Blood!)
content.author: Donelloth

content.name: Erik's Rogues
content.author: Erik T.
content.description: A set of 5 custom Arkham Horror Living Card Game investigators for the rogue class.

content.name: The Fathomless Sea Investigator Expansion
content.author: Flanfy
content.description: Contains five investigators and 180+ player cards.

content.name: Forget Me Not
content.author: TomásAmi
content.description: An Arkham lore-friendly fan-expansion. Horror is brewing in Buenos Aires, Argentina, and some new investigators are trapped in the middle of it.

content.name: Full Art Encounter Cards
content.author: hauke
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'All Encounter Cards Box' (stored in the barrel in the bottom right corner). This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes!

content.name: The Ghosts of Onigawa
content.author: Myriad
content.description: Inspired by the Ghosts of Onigawa Campaign Expansion, the Ghosts of Onigawa Investigator Expansion contains 100 custom player cards and 6 custom investigators.

content.name: Girls' Frontline
content.author: Flanfy
content.description: Contains five investigators from the Girls' Frontline mobage developed by MICA Team.

content.name: Golden Gate Investigators
content.author: tyrannonorris
content.description: This pack contains six investigators based on an unfinished campaign set in San Francisco.

content.name: Hellboy Investigators
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Is this a time shift? A dimensional overlap? Magic gone wrong? This pack contains Hellboy and the other eclectic members of the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense.

content.name: Hollow Special Operations Section 6 Investigator Expansion
content.author: Whimsical
content.description: A collection of four investigators (along with a single normal card) based on the faction of the same name from Zenless Zone Zero. Included are Hoshimi Miyabi, Tsukishiro Yanagi, Asaba Harumasa, and Soukaku.

content.name: Kaimonogatari
content.author: toastsushi (Makima)
content.description: This expansion contains five investigators from the Monogatari series and more than 100 player cards (there is a related campaign, too!).

content.name: Kancolle Investigator Pack
content.author: Annonano / Penguinmafia
content.description: This is a set of 5 custom investigators based off the browser game Kancolle by Kadokawa Games.

content.name: Legends Retold - SHU Kingdom
content.author: Popest
content.description: This is a fan-made investigator expansion, inspired by the card game Legends of the Three Kingdoms. It introduces 15 double-sided investigators, divided among the three Kingdoms: SHU, WEI, and WU — with 5 investigators from each Kingdom.

content.name: Legends Retold - WEI Kingdom
content.author: Popest
content.description: This is a fan-made investigator expansion, inspired by the card game Legends of the Three Kingdoms. It introduces 15 double-sided investigators, divided among the three Kingdoms: SHU, WEI, and WU — with 5 investigators from each Kingdom.

content.name: Legends Retold - WU Kingdom
content.author: Popest
content.description: This is a fan-made investigator expansion, inspired by the card game Legends of the Three Kingdoms. It introduces 15 double-sided investigators, divided among the three Kingdoms: SHU, WEI, and WU — with 5 investigators from each Kingdom.

content.name: Limbus Company
content.author: Nepunyan
content.description: Custom investigators based off a Project Moon game Limbus Company.

content.name: Lola Hayes Rework
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: Lola Hayes reimagined as a method actor. Each round, she chooses a new persona from a customizable roster of famous figures in literature, mythology, and history.

content.name: Magical Girl Arkham Project
content.author: Flanfy
content.description: ~70 investigators for the Arkham Horror LCG from the Magical Girl Raising Project light novel series, written by Asari Endou and illustrated by Marui-no.

content.name: Mass Effect Investigators
content.author: Erdjo
content.description: Mass Effect characters come to life in Arkham Horror LCG as playable investigators. The mod includes Shepard and all 19 squad members (but not Morinth).

content.name: Moonshine Misfits
content.author: Moonshie
content.description: This is a set of custom investigators designed by Moonshie, following the EotE pattern of card access.

content.name: Monster High
content.author: Nintenspiders
content.description: Features 5 homebrew Monster High investigators

content.name: MythosBusters Campaign Play-Along Cards
content.author: MythosBusters
content.description: Includes Contracts and Tasks from the Campaign-Playalong on Discord

content.name: Night of Vespers
content.author: aughhhh
content.description: Night of Vespers is a fanmade player card expansion, consisting of 126 new cards for players to use, including 13 Specialist cards inspired by FFG's The Drowned City.

content.name: Ordinary Citizens
content.author: HatfulBob
content.description: A small pack of 6 investigators, a thematic gaggle of guys & gals that are just ordinary citizens getting stuck in some pretty extraordinary circumstances!

content.name: Popest's Animated Vol. 1
content.author: Popest
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'Additional Cards Box' in the upper left corner. This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes! Scenario cards can not be automatically replaced at the moment.

content.name: Popest's Animated Vol. 2
content.author: Popest
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'Additional Cards Box' in the upper left corner. This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes! Scenario cards can not be automatically replaced at the moment.

content.name: Popest's Borderless Vol. 1
content.author: Popest
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'Additional Cards Box' in the upper left corner. This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes! Scenario cards can not be automatically replaced at the moment.

content.name: Popest's Borderless Vol. 2
content.author: Popest
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'Additional Cards Box' in the upper left corner. This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes! Scenario cards can not be automatically replaced at the moment.

content.name: Popest's Borderless Vol. 3
content.author: Popest
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'Additional Cards Box' in the upper left corner. This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes! Scenario cards can not be automatically replaced at the moment.

content.name: Popest's Borderless Vol. 4
content.author: Popest
content.description: Instructions: Put this box into the 'Additional Cards Box' in the upper left corner. This will replace the corresponding cards for all purposes! Scenario cards can not be automatically replaced at the moment.

content.name: Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: 10 investigators, 250 player cards, 34 weaknesses adapted from the 90s classic Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon.

content.name: Rabbit Hole Expansion
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: Player cards that are upgrades and downgrades of official Arkham cards.

content.name: The Return to Mystic Upgrades
content.author: Kyo
content.description: Contains the 9 level 2 Mystic asset upgrades that could have been included in Return to Circle Undone, Innsmouth Conspiracy, and Scarlet Keys.

content.name: The Sands of Memphis
content.author: Myriad
content.description: The Sands of Memphis Investigator Expansion contains 100 custom player cards and 6 custom investigators, inspired by the forthcoming Sands of Memphis Campaign Expansion.

content.name: The Shadows of Arkham
content.author: Kyo
content.description: Several investigators and player cards

content.name: Signature Replacements
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: A set of signature replacements for each officially released Arkham investigator.

content.name: Six of Crows
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: Investigators and player cards from Leigh Bardugo's Grishaverse series.

content.name: Strawberry Shortcake - Investigator Pack
content.author: Blankiecat
content.description: A couple of investigators based on Strawberry Shortcake - Berry in the big City.

content.name: Team Fortress 2 Investigators
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A set of 10 fan-made investigators based on Team Fortress 2

content.name: Tintin and Haddock Investigators
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A pair of fan-made investigators

content.name: Touhou Project Investigators
content.author: CuddlyZombie
content.description: A set of five custom investigators based off the Touhou Project franchise

content.name: Wanda Maximoff, the Scarlet Witch
content.author: Adran06
content.description: Behold, Wanda, a mage with quite a bit of chaotic power to her. She thrives off of manipulating chaos tokens and her decks to get her powers to do what she needs. Do you have what it takes to master Chaos Magic?

content.name: Zenless Zone Zero
content.author: KenTen
content.description: A set of ten custom investigators from the hit HoYoverse Game: Zenless Zone Zero.

content.name: Ages Unwound
content.author: Olivia Juliet
content.description: Timey Wimey Campaign, now with actual dinosaurs! Everyone loves dinosaurs (for some reason).

content.name: Alice in Wonderland
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Alice in Wonderland is an 8-part campaign adapted from Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland and Through the Looking-Glass by Lewis Carroll.

content.name: The Approaching Storm
content.author: Kristofer Bengtsson
content.description: Your duty is to help Dr. Armitage turns into a deadly game of hide and seek, as one of his colleagues is murdered in front of your very eyes.

content.name: Betrayal at the Mountains of Madness
content.author: Jaxtrasi
content.description: It is 1935. The world has changed, and so have the investigators of Arkham.

content.name: Bloodborne - City of the Unseen
content.author: aughhhh
content.description: You awaken from an illness to an Arkham transformed, but to discover what has happened to your world, you must first survive the Hunt.

content.name: Call of the Plaguebearer
content.author: Dr. Jack Science
content.description: When mysterious plague-clouds descend upon the city of Arkham, it's up to a group of investigators to unravel the mysteries...

content.name: Celtic Rising
content.author: QggOne
content.description: A Celtic themed 5 part cycle aimed at newer players with a smaller collection.

content.name: Circus Ex Mortis
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Welcome to the greatest show of your life! The New Moon Circus visits Arkham with a cruel and insidious plot, concerning ancient prophecy and the coming eclipse!

content.name: Close Encounters of the LV-426 Kind
content.author: Adran06

content.name: The Colour Out of Oz
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: The Colour Out of Space crash lands in the magical land of Oz! Join forces with the stalwart citizens of the fairy country to stop the horrible infection!

content.name: The Crown of Egil
content.author: analyzechris
content.description: Iceland is on the verge of celebrating its 1000th year of independence, but trouble is brewing in Reykjavik.

content.name: Cyclopean Foundations
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: The archetypal campaign, with the archetypal Lovecraftian threat. The campaign masterfully uses its unique mechanic pervasively.

content.name: Dark Matter
content.author: Axolotl
content.description: It is 2147, and you have just woken up from cryo-sleep in a seemingly abandoned space ship - a deep space adventure across the solar system to prevent the extinction of the human race...

content.name: Darkham Horror
content.author: Frostmaze
content.description: Darkest Dungeon meets Arkham Horror — a match made in hell! An 8-part campaign set in the Darkest Dungeon universe (along with 5 new investigators and player cards).

content.name: The Ghosts of Onigawa
content.author: Myriad
content.description: The sudden disappearance of two young local girls from the remote hamlet of Minakami village draws you into a sinister plot spanning all of human history. Can you survive the twilight of Onigawa?

content.name: Half-Life
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Chaos sweeps over Arkham as portals and monsters rock the city, but this is only a prelude to the horrific events of an alien-dominated future!

content.name: Heart of Darkness
content.author: Vinn Quest
content.description: Travel deep into the heart of the Congo and navigate its perilous waters aboard the Roi des Belges to discover the Heart of Darkness.

content.name: Into the Shadowlands
content.author: John H
content.description: Prepare to unravel a new mistery in the Arkham Universe...

content.name: Jumanji
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: This is a 4-part mini-campaign for Arkham Horror: The Card Game based on the book by Chris van Allsburg and the 1995 movie adaptation of the book.

content.name: Kaimonogatari
content.author: toastsushi (Makima)
content.description: You receive a call from a Japanese contact that aided you years ago. He tells you something strange is happening in Japan. Needing a few more helping hands, you start your investigation in an unnamed town. How hard of a request could it be?

content.name: Lovecrafter 3077
content.author: RudeRugg
content.description: A heavily cyber-modded femme fatale hires you to uncover the truth behind her sister’s recent death. Are you ready to be undone?

content.name: Made in Abyss
content.author: Sair
content.description: After a colleague's disappearance, your obsessive research into an uncharted island leads you on an otherworldly expedition.

content.name: The Matter of Britain
content.author: Frying Tonight
content.description: An 8 part campaign for Arkham Horror LCG based on the legend of King Arthur.

content.name: Night of Vespers
content.author: aughhhh
content.description: A night of luxury at Arkham's Hotel Seasons ends in bloodshed, drawing you into a globe-spanning mystery as old as time itself that you must unravel to have any hope of survival. Whether or not you'll be able to piece together this ancient puzzle, beware -- The Sorrows are watching.

content.name: The (Unofficial) Return to the Innsmouth Conspiracy
content.author: DerBK
content.description: This is a fan-made expansion that is meant to show what a Return to Innsmouth could've looked like, if it would have been released.

content.name: Souls of Darkness
content.author: JackOfHearts
content.description: The death of a mysterious collector and the relics of his estate have brought an ancient mystery to Arkham.

content.name: The War of the Worlds
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A fanmade 3-part campaign for the Arkham Horror LCG for 1-4 players based on H.G. Wells' The War of the Worlds.

content.name: The Worlds of Android
content.author: Frostmaze
content.description: A fan campaign for Arkham Horror LCG, based in the world of Android: Netrunner. It contains 11 scenarios (of which you will play 7).

content.name: Winter Winds
content.author: Nicholas Kory
content.description: A fanmade 3-part campaign

content.name: The Witcher Horror
content.author: Ubique Sajan
content.description: Custom investigator & scenario expansion to Arkham Horror LCG - around 180 card and 1 scenario that are based on the Witcher.

content.name: Against the Wendigo
content.author: Vinn Quest
content.description: A sequel to the Call Of Cthulhu RPG add-on “Alone Against the Wendigo”. Several months later you explore the wild Hanninah Valley in Canada, looking for the missing students of Dr. Nadelmann’s expedition.

content.name: Arkham Incidents
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A set of five standalone scenarios intended to be used as side-stories in campaigns. Each scenario focuses on an existing player ally and gives reward cards that synergize with that ally.

content.name: Code Red at Bleeding Heart
content.author: Myriad
content.description: After receiving some mysterious communications from the decrepit ruins of Bleeding Heart on the outskirts of Arkham, the investigators attempt to investigate the abandoned hospital campus.

content.name: Cosmic Pantheon
content.author: Mint Tea Fan & hauke
content.description: 3 alternative factions that can be mix and matched with the 3 existing factions of War of the Outer Gods standalone.

content.name: Defense of the Arkham
content.author: Rei
content.description: Standalone scenario very losely based on MOBAs and DoTA, mostly drawing from it as a source of inspiration.

content.name: Election Night
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A challenge scenario for Charlie Kane

content.name: The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Match wits with dangerous mentalists that seek to rend the veil between life and death!

content.name: The Fall of the House of Usher
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Standalone scenario based on the Edgar Allan Poe story

content.name: Fortune or Folly - Parallel Rex Murphy
content.author: Davi
content.description: Fan-made challenge scenario for Rex Murphy (includes a fan-made version of Parallel Rex too!)

content.name: The Grand Oak Hotel
content.author: ArgusTheCat
content.description: The old building has stood as a staple of main street for twenty years. It exudes a feeling of wealth and the upscale class of New York. Less modern, however, is the disturbing secret history of the well known hotel.

content.name: The Invisible Man
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Match wits with Griffin, a murderous chemist who has discovered the secrets of invisibility!

content.name: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A fanmade single scenario for the Arkham Horror LCG for 1-4 players based on Washington Irving's The Legend of Sleepy Hollow.

content.name: The Midwinter Gala - Fashionably Late
content.author: Mint Tea Fan
content.description: This is an addendum to the standalone scenario 'The Midwinter Gala'. Included are 15 new guest assets for you to interact with.

content.name: Miskatonic Mouse
content.author: TerranChef
content.description: When the Happiest Place on Earth shows up outside Arkham, surely nothing sinister could be happening, right?

content.name: Mythos Deviations
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: A set of six fanmade scenarios and six investigators to integrate into the first six official campaigns.

content.name: The Phantom of the Opera
content.author: TheBeard
content.description: Even in distant Arkham, word of the horror and murder at the Opera Garnier has reached the investigators, and they set out to end the fiendish exploits of the sinister Phantom!

content.name: Return to the Consternation on the Constellation
content.author: Myriad

content.name: Snakes and Ladders
content.author: Olivia Juliet
content.description: When an unnatural disaster befalls Boston, the survivors are left trapped in the collapsed city, the treacherous climb out made yet more dangerous by the terrible, snake-like creatures stalking them through the wreckage. Snakes and Ladders is a ...unique scenario.

content.name: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
content.author: TheBeard

content.name: The Symphony of Erich Zann
content.author: Axolotl
content.description: Investigators must discover 'The Symphony of Erich Zann' and uncover the mystery behind the disappearance of the titular violist.

content.name: 'Tis The Season
content.author: Frying Tonight
content.description: An unnatural shopping fever has struck Arkham in the festive season and it's up to you to find out who or what is responsible. Be good for goodness sake!
